import React from "react"; import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../../context/cart.context' import CheckoutItem from '../../checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.style.scss' const Checkout = () => { const { cartItems, cartTotal } = useContext(CartContext) return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{cartItems.map(cartItem => )}
TOTAL: ${cartTotal}
) } export default Checkout
